content:
"Good morning team! Today's forecast is looking promising with expected sales up by 13.9% compared to normal Saturdays. Due to the Canucks' home game and 'Looking Back on 2025' event, we're anticipating increased foot traffic. To prepare, please make sure to have an adequate stock of pre-rolls and beverages readily available for quick purchases. With a potential increase in sales, consider staffing at Normal+ levels if possible.

Let's review our inventory counts before opening to ensure we're adequately prepared for the expected surge in demand. Let's work together to provide excellent service and make today a successful one!"
